name: d.pikalov
body:
### Demos
* Samsung GearS used as Remote Control to rotate the cube on the phone.
[Handpointer](http://dpikalov.github.io/handpointer)

* Leapmotion + virtual keyboard for VR.
[3D Keyboard](http://dpikalov.github.io/keyboard/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
